TopicTitle: Cant get back in to pod

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I have just done a landing on Mun and got out with Jeb to take some samples as do some science. When I try to go back in I hit "F" key first to grab the hatch then it doesn't give me another option to go in to open the hatch, which would usually be done by hitting "F" once more. The vessel still has electric charge so I don't think that is an issue. I would greatly appreciate some help.

Thank you.
Just move up or down the ladder. The option will appear eventually.

you can also rightclick on the hatch and enter if it's not obstructed.If it is, press "r", get some altitude,distance and ram that damn thing until it rolls over or your kerbal dies.(yes ,happened last night as I crashed into the wheel)
Pictures of your ship might help. Is something overlapping the door?
Yeah, having something blocking the pod might be an issue. Once I just quicksaved and quickloaded and it fixed it for no reason :/

As said, piccies would help, but are you transfering the kerbal from elsewhere? If so, you may have the hatch obstructed. If not (i.e. the kerbal is from that pod), the hatch can't be obstructed since you did get out
Thank you guys, I think it was a bug because after reloading the game back up I was able to go in again.
